_xResult.title: High Waisted Leggings
_xResult.longdesc:
If you're paying $100 for that famous brand of leggings which are NOT custom made of delicious natural bamboo fabric, you are missing out on a double treat! Delia von Hahn is a Canadian clothing maker with a passion for sustainable, wearable, super comfortable items you'll grab over and over. And Balodana is the exclusive place to get them!

Wear these lovelies as athletic leggings for yoga, pilates or running; they're also fantastic as cozy leggings under skirts or tunics. The micro-ribbed bamboo fabric is breathable and sustainable, and feels so incredibly soft. Feel safe in these squat proof leggings whenever you wear them.

  • Stretchy and supportive. An active legging designed with a high waist

  • Designed with a slim fit that holds the body and smooths out any bumps

  • Confident; no “see through” leggings

  • Flattering, above the ankle length (unless specified otherwise)

  • 4 way stretch bamboo fabric

Fabric: Sustainable Bamboo Rib - Classic woven, heavyweight fabric.

Content: 65% Bamboo Rayon, 28% Cotton, 7% Elastic

Care: machine cold wash, tumble dry low or hang to dry, do not bleach, steam iron with protective cloth

Colour: Black

properties.propvalue: Hand or machine wash cold, dry flat or hang.
